title: Artful & Gracious (+Cool)
description: When you perform your chosen art — any act of expression or culture — or when you put its product before an audience, roll+Cool.

outcomes.text: Choose 3 NPCs who are in your audience. For each NPC in turn, choose 1:
bullets: This person must have my services.
This person must give me a gift.

outcomes.text: You gain no benefit, but suffer no harm or lost opportunity. You simply perform very well.

title: Breathtaking
description: You get +1Ψ (max 3-Ψ). When you **reason with someone**, add your Ψ to your roll.

title: Incandescent (Highly Interruptible)
description: When you make a show and display of passion — anguish, love, fury, any — no one who can see you can do anything but watch. You command their absolute attention. If you choose, you can exempt individual people, by name.

title: Lost (+Weird, Highly Interruptible)
description: When you whisper someone's name to the world's psychic maelstrom, roll+Weird.

outcomes.text: They come to you, with or without any clear explanation why. Take +1forward against them.
They come to you, with or without any clear explanation why.
The MC will ask you 3 questions; answer them truthfully.

title: Subtle Scrutiny (+Cool)
description: When you enter into a nonviolent situation, roll+Cool.

outcomes.text: Ask the MC 3 of the following questions:
bullets: Who hopes that I walk on without paying any mind?
Who here is unexpected and might have answers for me?
How have loyalties shifted since last time I was here?
What is the biggest danger here, to me or to the people here?

outcomes.text: Choose 1 anyway, but tell the MC that your scrutiny isn't as subtle as you think.

title: Distinctive Weapons
pickOne: **Beautiful vintage handgun** (*3-harm, close, loud, valuable, ammo: 3*)
**Lavishly decorated hunting rifle** (*4-harm, far, loud, valuable, ammo: 3*)

title: Improvements
description: Choose 2 Luminous moves. Your luxe setup might give you **tinkering** as well. At 6Xp, choose an improvement and erase.

Add an option to your luxe setup
